issue.title: 18: bad-txns-inputs-spent

events.body:
As mentionned in the issue template :
```
This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to Bitcoin Core.

General bitcoin questions and/or support requests are best directed to the Bitcoin StackExchange at https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com.
```
You can also ask on [bitcointalk](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=6.0).
Anyway the first input of your transaction tries to spend the second output created by ed34d4d2b9953a4ef585a13454a00501783675752b640b8cc68235afe5495498, [which is an OP_RETURN (thus unspendable)](https://blockstream.info/testnet/tx/ed34d4d2b9953a4ef585a13454a00501783675752b640b8cc68235afe5495498).
